attributes.action: build a bypass round sandford dorset,from the bakers arms roundabout to the wareham bypass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sandford is a small village in dorset, but on the main a351 road to the coast all traffic travelling to wareham,corfe castle,swanage,studland,wool,bovington,weymouth,etc must travel on this road we have both a first school and a middle school  on this road and our children must breathe in the harmful fumes from all the stationary cars lorries and coaches on a daily basis,please build us the bypass we so desparetely need
